content.text: 0) In a medium saucepan combine whipping cream, butter or margarine, and grated Parmesan cheese.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "combine"@24:31 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "whipping cream"@32:46 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "butter or margarine"@48:67 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "grated Parmesan cheese"@73:95 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a medium saucepan"@6:23 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Cook over medium low heat until smooth.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Cook"@3:7 / AC
		:heat ( temp-1-0 "medium low heat"@13:28 / TEMPERATURE )
		:until ( cond-1-0 "until smooth"@29:41 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
